name: Hallway 2
long: You are in a wide, brightly lit hallway connecting classrooms. There are lockers for the students along the walls of this hallway. There is a water fountain here.
short: A wide bright hall with lockers and classrooms.
addl: A train whistle sounds across the lonely field

features.lockers: The lockers are newly painted for the school year but dings and dents and old markings are evident on closer examination.
features.water fountain: Freshly cleaned by the staff, this water fountain provides clean, cold water.
